original_title: Basri & Salma dalam Komedi yang Terus Berputar
overview: Basri and Salma, a childless couple who have been married for 5 years, own an Odong-Odong at the carnival together, spending their days entertaining and taking care of other peopleâ€™s children without any of their own. One day they have to attend a family reunion where they are being intimidated and repressed by other family members. Between meddling relatives, self-doubt and an explosive confrontation,  they uncover why they have not been blessed with a child.
title: Basri & Salma in A Never-Ending Comedy
